ai-tika-abh09t0:0_0: Reverence to him, the Fortunate One, the Worthy One, the Perfect Sambuddha
ai-tika-abh09t0:2_0: At one time the Buddha was staying among the gods of the Thirty-Three at the root of the Shady Orchid Tree on the stone spread with a cream rug.
ai-tika-abh09t0:2_1: There the Fortunate One gave a talk to the gods of the Thirty-Three.
ai-tika-abh09t0:5_0: Wholesome thoughts, unwholesome thoughts, thoughts without consequences.
ai-tika-abh09t0:5_3: thoughts that are attached to and favourable to the attachments, and have grasping aggregates,
ai-tika-abh09t0:5_4: thoughts that are defiled and connected with the defilements, and are uncorrupted.
ai-tika-abh09t0:5_5: Thoughts that are without thinking and without placing the mind and keeping it connected are without placing the mind and keeping it connected are without placing the mind and keeping it connected.
ai-tika-abh09t0:5_6: thoughts that are united with pleasure and happiness,
ai-tika-abh09t0:5_7: Thoughts that are to be given up neither through vision (of the First Path) nor through development (of the rest of the Paths)
ai-tika-abh09t0:5_8: Thoughts that have roots that are to be given up through vision (of the First Path)
ai-tika-abh09t0:5_10: Those neither in training nor no longer in training
ai-tika-abh09t0:5_13: thoughts that are inferior, middling, and excellent things
ai-tika-abh09t0:5_14: thoughts that are wrongful and have a fixed destiny,
ai-tika-abh09t0:5_15: thoughts that have path as their objects, thoughts as their predominant (factor);
ai-tika-abh09t0:5_17: thoughts that are past, future, and present;
ai-tika-abh09t0:5_18: thoughts that are past objects, and future objects;
ai-tika-abh09t0:5_19: thoughts that are his own and another’s;
ai-tika-abh09t0:5_20: thoughts that are internal and external objects;
ai-tika-abh09t0:5_21: thoughts that are visible and have impingement, and are not visible and have impingement.
ai-tika-abh09t0:7_0: if she does not out of faults;
ai-tika-abh09t0:8_0: robes for the sake of defecatings.
ai-tika-abh09t0:9_0: roots are not rooted in all things.
ai-tika-abh09t0:9_1: thoughts that have roots that are connected with roots,
ai-tika-abh09t0:9_2: thoughts that are associated with roots,
ai-tika-abh09t0:9_3: (they are) connected with roots (but) are not roots.
ai-tika-abh09t0:9_4: thoughts associated with roots and conditions are not rooted in the same way.
ai-tika-abh09t0:9_5: Thoughts that are roots but are connected with roots
ai-tika-abh09t0:9_6: robes for the sake of defecatings.
ai-tika-abh09t0:11_0: Thoughts that are with cause and reasons
ai-tika-abh09t0:11_2: Thoughts that are visible and have no disrespect
ai-tika-abh09t0:11_3: thoughts that are visible and have impingement,
ai-tika-abh09t0:11_6: some things are not perceptible in another way.
ai-tika-abh09t0:13_3: thoughts that are pollutants but are not pollutants.
ai-tika-abh09t0:13_4: thoughts that are associated with pollutants but are not pollutants.
ai-tika-abh09t0:13_5: Since thoughts are unassociated with pollutants, also their pollutants are pollutants.
ai-tika-abh09t0:15_0: thoughts that are fetters but are not fetters.
ai-tika-abh09t0:15_1: Thoughts that are unfavourable to the fetters
ai-tika-abh09t0:15_2: thoughts that are associated with the fetters,
ai-tika-abh09t0:15_3: thoughts that are favourable to the fetters but are not fetters.
ai-tika-abh09t0:15_4: thoughts that are associated with fetters but are not fetters.
ai-tika-abh09t0:17_1: thoughts that are unconnected with the knots,
ai-tika-abh09t0:17_2: thoughts that are associated with knots,
ai-tika-abh09t0:17_3: thoughts that are favourable to the knots but are not knots.
ai-tika-abh09t0:17_4: thoughts that are associated with knots but are not knots
ai-tika-abh09t0:17_5: thoughts that are unfavourable to the knots, and the knots are knots,
ai-tika-abh09t0:18_0: the household life is to be prepared.
ai-tika-abh09t0:19_0: thoughts that are misery, not floods;
ai-tika-abh09t0:19_1: thoughts that are floods, floods, and favourable to the floods
ai-tika-abh09t0:19_2: thoughts that are associated with floods,
ai-tika-abh09t0:19_3: thoughts that are floods, but are not floods.
ai-tika-abh09t0:19_4: thoughts that are associated with floods but are not floods.
ai-tika-abh09t0:19_5: The thoughts that are unfavourable to the floods, but have a flood that are unshakable to the flood.
ai-tika-abh09t0:19_6: the household life is to be prepared.
ai-tika-abh09t0:21_1: thoughts that are unfavourable to the yokes,
ai-tika-abh09t0:21_2: thoughts that are associated with yokes, (but) are unassociated with the yokes,
ai-tika-abh09t0:21_3: yokes that are favourable to the yokes but are not yokes
ai-tika-abh09t0:21_4: (or) thoughts that are associated with yokes but are not yokes.
ai-tika-abh09t0:21_5: That which is unfavourable to the yokes, and yokes are unfavourable to the yokes.
ai-tika-abh09t0:23_0: thoughts that are hindrances but are not hindrances
ai-tika-abh09t0:23_1: thoughts that are unfavourable to the hindrances,
ai-tika-abh09t0:23_2: thoughts that are associated with hindrances but are associated with hindrances
ai-tika-abh09t0:23_3: thoughts that are hindrances but are not hindrances
ai-tika-abh09t0:23_4: thoughts that are associated with hindrances but are not hindrances
ai-tika-abh09t0:23_5: But the things that are unfavourable to the hindrances are unshakable to the hindrances.
ai-tika-abh09t0:25_0: thoughts that are adherences but are not adherences.
ai-tika-abh09t0:25_1: Thoughts that are not adhered to
ai-tika-abh09t0:25_2: thoughts that are associated with adherences, (but) are unassociated with adherences,
ai-tika-abh09t0:25_3: thoughts that are adhered to, (but) are conducive to heaven, but not to others.
ai-tika-abh09t0:25_4: But they don’t enjoy the things that are unassociated and disliked.
ai-tika-abh09t0:27_2: mental factors and thoughts that are unknown
ai-tika-abh09t0:27_3: thoughts that are associated with the mind;
ai-tika-abh09t0:27_4: thoughts that are produced by mind and favourable to the mind;
ai-tika-abh09t0:27_5: thoughts that are produced by mind, not produced by mind;
ai-tika-abh09t0:27_6: thoughts that are equivalent, not developed by mind;
ai-tika-abh09t0:27_7: Thoughts that are not kept rolling by mind
ai-tika-abh09t0:27_8: thoughts that are produced by mind and kept produced by mind,
ai-tika-abh09t0:27_9: thoughts that are productions that are produced by mind and developed by mind,
ai-tika-abh09t0:27_10: thoughts that are produced by mind and kept rolling by mind,
ai-tika-abh09t0:27_13: thoughts that are attached to and have not been attached to,
ai-tika-abh09t0:28_0: The group of six are used for the five topics.
ai-tika-abh09t0:29_1: thoughts that are proficient in the attachments,
ai-tika-abh09t0:29_2: thoughts that are associated with the attachments,
ai-tika-abh09t0:29_3: thoughts that are favourable to the attachments but are not attachments.
ai-tika-abh09t0:29_4: thoughts that are associated with the attachments but are not attachments
ai-tika-abh09t0:29_5: These things are unassociated with the attachments, and the grasping aggregates are unknown.
ai-tika-abh09t0:29_6: The group of six are used for the five topics.
ai-tika-abh09t0:31_0: thoughts that are defilements but are not defilements
ai-tika-abh09t0:31_1: thoughts that are defiled and connected with the defilements;
ai-tika-abh09t0:31_2: thoughts that are grounds for a mixing,
ai-tika-abh09t0:31_3: thoughts that are associated with the defilements
ai-tika-abh09t0:31_4: thoughts that are defiled, (but) are connected with the defilements but are connected with the defilements but are not defilements
ai-tika-abh09t0:31_5: thoughts that are defiled, and they are nothing connected with the defilements but live (of the defilements) as their defilements.
ai-tika-abh09t0:31_6: thoughts that are associated with the defilements but are not defilements
ai-tika-abh09t0:31_7: Since thoughts are unassociated with the defilements, their defilements are unborn,
ai-tika-abh09t0:33_0: thoughts that are to be given up through vision (of the first path),
ai-tika-abh09t0:33_1: thoughts that are to be given up through cultivation (of the rest of the paths),
ai-tika-abh09t0:33_2: Thoughts that have roots that are to be given up through vision (of the First Path)
ai-tika-abh09t0:33_3: Thoughts that have roots that are not to be given up through development (of the rest of the Paths)
ai-tika-abh09t0:33_4: thoughts that are with thinking and without thinking;
ai-tika-abh09t0:33_6: Thoughts that are connected with joyful interest
ai-tika-abh09t0:33_7: thoughts that are united with joy,
ai-tika-abh09t0:33_8: thoughts that are united with pleasure and happiness,
ai-tika-abh09t0:33_9: thoughts that are united with equanimity;
ai-tika-abh09t0:33_10: Thoughts that are in the sense-spheres
ai-tika-abh09t0:33_11: Thoughts that are not in the form worlds,
ai-tika-abh09t0:33_12: Thoughts that are in the formless realms
ai-tika-abh09t0:33_15: thoughts that do not have a fixed destiny;
ai-tika-abh09t0:34_0: if she understands contrary to the Teaching;
ai-tika-abh09t0:36_0: Thoughts that are clear in the counterpart of knowledge.
ai-tika-abh09t0:36_3: Thoughts that are dark and bright
ai-tika-abh09t0:36_6: thoughts that have ceased, and ceased,
ai-tika-abh09t0:36_9: Ignorance and craving for continued existence.
ai-tika-abh09t0:36_10: Views favoring continued existence and views favoring ending existence.
ai-tika-abh09t0:36_11: The view of annihilationist and annihilation of views.
ai-tika-abh09t0:36_12: The view of the self and the cosmos.
ai-tika-abh09t0:36_13: Views of the past and the future.
ai-tika-abh09t0:36_16: Being hard to admonish and having bad friends.
ai-tika-abh09t0:36_17: Being easy to admonish and good friendship.
ai-tika-abh09t0:36_18: Skill in offenses and skill in rehabilitation from offenses.
ai-tika-abh09t0:36_19: Skill in meditative attainments and skill in emerging from those attainments.
ai-tika-abh09t0:36_20: Skill in the elements and skill in attention.
ai-tika-abh09t0:36_21: Skill in the sense fields and skill in dependent origination.
ai-tika-abh09t0:36_22: Skill in what is possible and skill in what is impossible.
ai-tika-abh09t0:36_26: Not guarding the sense doors and eating too much.
ai-tika-abh09t0:36_27: Not guarding the sense doors and eating too much.
ai-tika-abh09t0:36_28: Lack of mindfulness and lack of situational awareness.
ai-tika-abh09t0:36_30: The power of reflection and the power of development.
ai-tika-abh09t0:36_32: The foundation of serenity and the foundation of exertion.
ai-tika-abh09t0:36_34: Failure in ethics and failure in view.
ai-tika-abh09t0:36_35: Accomplishment in ethical conduct and accomplishment in view.
ai-tika-abh09t0:36_36: Purification of ethics and purification of view.
ai-tika-abh09t0:36_37: Purification of view and making an effort in line with that view.
ai-tika-abh09t0:36_38: Being inspired at inspiring places, and making a suitable effort when inspired.
ai-tika-abh09t0:36_39: To never be content with skillful qualities, and to never stop trying.
ai-tika-abh09t0:36_41: knowledge of the ending of craving,
ai-tika-abh09t0:38_0: The Book of the Dhamma is finished.
